documents.title: About Forever 22 Med Spa
documents.content: Forever 22 Med Spa is led by Brandi Sesock and provider Gale Tesar, offering personalized treatments in a boutique setting. The team provides individualized attention and care to each client, ensuring natural-looking results tailored to your unique needs and goals. Website: www.forever22medspa.com

documents.title: Consultations - Free & Available
documents.content:
AESTHETIC CONSULTATION (30 minutes):
- FREE of charge - no cost!
- Perfect if you're unsure which service is best for your goals
- We'll create a customized treatment plan together
- Review treatment process, cost, and pre/post-treatment instructions
- No obligation, just helpful guidance

WEIGHT LOSS CONSULTATION - IN PERSON (30 minutes):
- Discuss your weight loss goals and expectations
- Learn about our medically supervised program
- Review your recent lab work and determine if you're a candidate
- Results are fastest with healthy diet and exercise
- Brandi provides ongoing support throughout your journey

WEIGHT LOSS CONSULTATION - VIRTUAL VISIT (30 minutes):
- Same comprehensive consultation as in-person, via video call
- Perfect for busy schedules or remote clients
- Review lab work remotely and order medication
- Convenient follow-up option available

documents.title: Wrinkle Relaxers - Tox & Neuromodulators
documents.content:
TOX (BOTOX, XEOMIN, JEUVEAU, LETYBO, DAXXIFY) (30 minutes):
- FDA-approved treatments to smooth fine lines and wrinkles
- Works by blocking nerve signals to facial muscles that contract to form wrinkles
- Treatment areas: Forehead, Frown Lines (11s), Crow's Feet, Jawline, Bunny Lines, Brow Lift, Dimpled Chin, Lip Flip, Gummy Smile
- Pricing: $12 per unit (typical treatment 20-50 units)
- Results: Look younger and more refreshed for 3-4 months
- Minimal discomfort - like a small pinch
- No downtime required

HYPERHIDROSIS (EXCESSIVE SWEATING) TREATMENT:
- Botox injections to reduce excessive sweating
- Common areas: Underarms, hands, feet
- Results last 4-6 months
- Dramatically improves quality of life
- May be covered by insurance

MIGRAINE RELIEF - TRAPEZIUS INJECTIONS:
- Botox injections in shoulder/neck trigger points
- Significantly reduces migraine frequency and severity
- Results last 3-4 months
- Many patients see improvement after first treatment

documents.title: Dermal Fillers - Volume & Contouring
documents.content:
DERMAL FILLERS (1 hour):
- Revanesse and Juvederm injectables restore volume, smooth wrinkles, and enhance facial contours
- Results are usually immediate and last 6-18 months
- Treatment areas: Lips, Cheeks, Chin, Jawline, Smile Lines (nasolabial folds), Marionette Lines, Under Eyes, Perioral Lines
- Facial rebalancing often requires multiple syringes for optimal results
- Pricing: $650 per syringe (Juvederm, Revanesse, Restylane)

1 SYRINGE OF LIP FILLER (45 minutes):
- Full syringe for beautiful lip enhancement
- Includes numbing for comfort
- Immediate results, lasts 6-12 months
- Price: $650 per syringe

MINI LIP FILLER (45 minutes):
- Great introduction to lip filler!
- 1/2 syringe of hyaluronic acid filler
- Enhance your natural pout
- Perfect for subtle results

RADIESSE (1 hour):
- Calcium-based microspheres (not hyaluronic acid)
- Ideal for bony areas requiring structural support
- Perfect for: Prominent cheekbones, chiseled jawline, chin augmentation
- Creates more defined facial contours

SKINVIVE (45 minutes):
- The FIRST hyaluronic microdroplet injectable for smoothness
- Injectable moisturizer for glowing skin
- Improves smoothness and adds lasting radiance and glow over time
- Hydrates from within for improved overall skin quality

FILLER DISSOLVE / HYLENEX (30 minutes):
- Safely dissolves unwanted hyaluronic acid filler
- Quick reversal if needed
- Peace of mind with any filler treatment

documents.title: Weight Loss Programs & Follow-ups
documents.content:
MEDICALLY SUPERVISED WEIGHT LOSS PROGRAMS:
- Prescription weight loss injections administered weekly
- Brandi offers nutritional support throughout your weight loss journey
- Available virtually or in-person consultations
- Tailored program to meet each person's individual lifestyle
- Ongoing support until you reach your goals and after for maintenance
- Best results with healthy diet and exercise
- Many patients see significant results

NOTE FOR AI: Do NOT mention specific medication names, percentages, or how the medication works in SMS responses. Just offer to schedule a consultation where Brandi can explain everything in person.

WEIGHT LOSS FOLLOW-UP - SYMPTOM MANAGEMENT (20 minutes):
- Address any side effects from medication
- Prescription support medication available if needed
- Ongoing support throughout your journey

WEIGHT LOSS FOLLOW-UP - MEDICATION REFILL (15 minutes):
- Quick appointment to refill your medication
- Check progress and adjust as needed
- Convenient ongoing care

documents.title: Tixel Skin Resurfacing
documents.content:
Tixel is an advanced skin resurfacing treatment using thermal energy to improve texture, tone, and overall skin quality. Available for multiple areas:

TIXEL - FULL FACE (45 minutes):
- Comprehensive facial rejuvenation
- Improves fine lines, texture, and tone

TIXEL - FULL FACE & NECK (1 hour):
- Extended treatment for face and neck
- Creates cohesive, youthful appearance

TIXEL - DECOLLETE (30 minutes):
- Chest area rejuvenation
- Smooths sun damage and crepey skin

TIXEL - NECK (30 minutes):
- Targets neck lines and texture

TIXEL - AROUND THE EYES (30 minutes):
- Delicate eye area treatment
- Reduces fine lines and crow's feet

TIXEL - AROUND THE MOUTH (30 minutes):
- Softens perioral lines
- Improves lip area texture

TIXEL - UPPER ARMS (45 minutes):
- Improves crepey arm skin

TIXEL - HANDS (30 minutes):
- Rejuvenates aging hands
- Reduces sun damage and texture issues

documents.title: Laser Hair Removal - Permanent Reduction
documents.content:
LASER HAIR REMOVAL - X SMALL AREA (15 minutes):
- Areas: Upper Lip, Chin, Fingers, Toes
- Quick and effective

LASER HAIR REMOVAL - SMALL AREA (15 minutes):
- Areas: Lip & Chin combo, Front or Back of Neck
- Minimal treatment time

LASER HAIR REMOVAL - MEDIUM AREA (30 minutes):
- Areas: Full Arms, Beard
- Comfortable treatment sessions

LASER HAIR REMOVAL - LARGE AREA (45 minutes):
- Areas: Upper or Lower Back, Full Chest
- Comprehensive coverage

LASER HAIR REMOVAL - X LARGE AREA (1 hour):
- Areas: Full Back, Full Legs, Full Chest Plus Torso
- Extensive area treatment

TREATMENT INFO:
- Series of 6-8 sessions typically required
- Sessions spaced 4-6 weeks apart
- Permanent reduction of unwanted hair
- Safe for most skin types

documents.title: IPL Photofacial Treatments
documents.content:
IPL (Intense Pulsed Light) treats sun damage, age spots, redness, and improves overall skin tone:

IPL - FULL FACE (45 minutes):
- Comprehensive facial rejuvenation
- Reduces sun damage, age spots, and redness
- Evens skin tone and texture

IPL - CHEST (30 minutes):
- Treats sun damage on décolleté
- Improves skin tone and texture

IPL - NECK (15 minutes):
- Targets sun damage and discoloration
- Quick and effective treatment

documents.title: Tattoo Removal - Laser Technology
documents.content:
Professional laser tattoo removal for all sizes:

TATTOO REMOVAL - X SMALL AREA (15 minutes):
- Tiny tattoos
- Quick sessions

TATTOO REMOVAL - SMALL AREA (30 minutes):
- Small tattoos and symbols

TATTOO REMOVAL - MEDIUM AREA (30 minutes):
- Medium-sized designs

TATTOO REMOVAL - LARGE AREA (45 minutes):
- Larger tattoos

TATTOO REMOVAL - X LARGE AREA (1 hour):
- Very large tattoos

TATTOO REMOVAL - 1/2 SLEEVE (1 hour 30 minutes):
- Half-sleeve coverage

TATTOO REMOVAL - FULL SLEEVE (2 hours):
- Complete sleeve removal

TREATMENT INFO:
- Multiple sessions required (varies by tattoo)
- Sessions spaced 6-8 weeks apart
- Gradual fading over time
- Most colors can be treated

documents.title: Advanced Skin Treatments
documents.content:
KYBELLA - DOUBLE CHIN REDUCTION (1 hour):
- Say goodbye to your double chin ONCE AND FOR ALL
- Fat-dissolving injectable agent
- Addresses submental fat under the chin
- Deoxycholic acid destroys localized fat cells PERMANENTLY
- Multiple treatments may be needed for optimal results

VASCULAR LESION REMOVAL (30 minutes):
- Treats spider veins, broken capillaries, cherry angiomas
- Laser technology for precise results

FRACTIONAL ERBIUM LASER RESURFACING (45 minutes):
- Moderate skin resurfacing
- Improves texture, scars, and fine lines
- Less downtime than ablative

ABLATIVE ERBIUM LASER RESURFACING (1 hour 30 minutes):
- Deep skin resurfacing
- Dramatic improvement in wrinkles, scars, and sun damage
- More intensive treatment with longer recovery

PBF UNDER EYE TREATMENT (1 hour 15 minutes):
- Pure Bio-Fill Under Eye Treatment (Plasma Gel Biofiller)
- Uses your own plasma to create injectable gel
- Improves: Skin laxity, fine lines, dark circles, hollowness
- Natural, regenerative approach with growth factors
- Longer-lasting results than traditional fillers

documents.title: Signature Chemical Peels & Skin Rejuvenation
documents.content:
PERFECT DERMA PEEL (45 minutes) - BRANDI'S SIGNATURE TREATMENT:
- A FAVORITE service at Forever 22 Med Spa!
- Medium depth chemical peel with exceptional results
- Contains exfoliants and antioxidants including vitamin C and glutathione
- Refreshes and rejuvenates at the cellular level
- You'll peel for 3-4 days, then have PERFECT SKIN in 7 days
- Ideal for ANY skin type
- Addresses: Hyperpigmentation, large pore size, fine lines and wrinkles, acne scarring
- Penetrates deep to the cellular level
- Stimulates collagen production for firmer appearance
- Dramatic, transformative results

CHEMICAL PEEL - CUSTOMIZED (45 minutes):
- Removes superficial dead skin cells
- Stimulates growth of new cells
- Customized to target specific concerns
- Treats: Age spots, uneven tone, acne, texture, fine lines, hydration
- Best done in series (2-6 weeks apart)
- Improved radiance and complexion

MICRONEEDLING (45 minutes):
- Creates intentional micro-injuries to skin's surface
- Spurs natural healing process, generating collagen
- Growth factors improve elasticity and reduce fine lines
- Numbing cream applied for comfort
- Targets: Texture, discoloration, scars, fine lines, large pores
- RECOMMENDED: Series of 3 treatments, 4 weeks apart, then yearly maintenance
- Can add boosters: Salmon DNA or PRP from your blood

MICRONEEDLING WITH PRP (1 hour):
- Enhanced microneedling with Platelet-Rich Plasma from your blood
- Growth factors accelerate healing and enhance results
- Natural, longer-lasting results
- All benefits of traditional microneedling plus regenerative power

SALMON DNA FACIAL (1 hour):
- PDRN facial using polynucleotides from salmon DNA
- Rejuvenates and repairs skin at cellular level
- Promotes collagen production
- Improves skin elasticity and texture
- Can be used as microneedling booster
- Cutting-edge regenerative treatment

documents.title: Wellness & Vitamin Injections
documents.content:
B12 SHOT (15 minutes):
- Boosts energy, strength, and immune system
- Supports metabolism and combats fatigue
- Improves focus and concentration
- Supports healthy hair, skin, and nails
- RECOMMENDED: Once a week for 4 weeks, then monthly thereafter

NAD+ INJECTION (1 minute):
- Nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide for cellular energy
- Boosts collagen production
- Supports muscle strength and function
- Strengthens hair and immune system
- Anti-aging benefits
- Enhances mental clarity

ALPHA LIPOIC ACID INJECTION:
- Potent antioxidant for healthy skin
- Reduces inflammation throughout the body
- Supports overall wellness
- Quick injection

LYSINE INJECTION:
- Essential amino acid supplement
- Supports immune function and tissue repair
- Quick and effective

documents.title: PRP, PBF & Hair Restoration - Advanced Regenerative Treatments
documents.content:
BRANDI'S HIGH-SPEED CENTRIFUGE EQUIPMENT:
- Forever 22 has invested in advanced centrifuge technology
- Enables offering of cutting-edge PRP and PBF treatments
- Uses your own blood for natural, safe results

PRP (PLATELET-RICH PLASMA) FOR FILLERS:
- Blood sample spun in centrifuge to pool out platelets
- Creates plasma gel rich in growth factors
- Injected as a natural filler
- Natural, longer-lasting results than traditional fillers
- Works immediately and continues improving for several months

PRP FOR MICRONEEDLING:
- PRP applied during microneedling treatment
- Growth factors enhance healing and results
- Accelerates collagen production
- Superior results compared to microneedling alone

PBF (PLASMA GEL BIOFILLER):
- Advanced form of PRP treatment
- Creates injectable gel from your own blood
- Used for under-eye treatment and facial rejuvenation
- Growth factors create natural, long-lasting results
- Regenerative approach to anti-aging

PRP FOR HAIR RESTORATION:
- Growth factor-rich blood injected into scalp
- Stimulates new hair growth naturally
- RECOMMENDED: 3 sessions, given 2 weeks apart
- Works immediately and continues working for several months
- Non-surgical solution for hair loss

documents.title: Medical-Grade Skincare - SkinMedica Products
documents.content:
SKINMEDICA PHARMACEUTICAL-GRADE SKINCARE:
- Top medical-grade skincare line available at Forever 22
- Extends and enhances the benefits of aesthetic services
- Next-generation growth factors and peptides
- Pharmaceutical-grade formulations
- Visibly repairs and renews skin
- Delivers exceptional results beyond over-the-counter products
- Professional recommendations from Brandi
- Customized skincare routines for your specific needs
- Maintains and prolongs treatment results at home

documents.title: Booking & Payment Policies
documents.content:
DEPOSIT POLICY:
- $50 deposit required to secure appointment for new clients
- Deposit is refundable and applied to service cost
- Can be paid via credit card, debit card, or digital payment

CANCELLATION POLICY:
- Please cancel or reschedule at least 24 hours in advance
- Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice forfeit deposit
- We understand emergencies happen - please reach out to discuss

PAYMENT OPTIONS:
- Credit/debit cards accepted (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Discover)
- HSA/FSA cards accepted for eligible treatments
- Financing options may be available for larger treatments

FIRST-TIME CLIENTS:
- New clients welcome!
- FREE aesthetic consultation (no obligation)
- Brandi takes time to understand your goals
- Personalized treatment plan created for you

documents.title: Provider Information - Brandi Sesock & Gale Tesar
documents.content:

- Experienced aesthetic provider and practice owner
- Provides personalized, one-on-one care
- Specializes in: Botox/Tox, Dermal Fillers, Weight Loss Programs, Laser Treatments, Skin Resurfacing, Microneedling, Chemical Peels, and more
- Known for natural-looking results and warm, caring approach
- Takes time with each client to ensure comfort and satisfaction
- Boutique med spa atmosphere - you'll never feel rushed
- Personally responds to all client inquiries

GALE TESAR:
- Additional aesthetic provider at Forever 22 Med Spa
- Available for select services (see list below)

SERVICES WITH TWO PROVIDERS (BRANDI SESOCK OR GALE TESAR):

SINGLE-PROVIDER SERVICES:
- All other services not listed above currently have one provider

documents.title: Contact & Scheduling
documents.content:
CONTACT:
- Text is preferred for quick questions and scheduling
- Phone: Available during business hours
- Brandi personally responds to all inquiries
- Website: www.forever22medspa.com

SCHEDULING:
- Book online through our booking portal (available on website)
- Flexible scheduling to accommodate your needs
- Same-day or next-day appointments often available
- Virtual consultations available for weight loss programs

AVAILABILITY:
- Brandi is often with patients during business hours
- If she can't answer immediately, she'll respond as soon as she's available
- Evening and weekend appointments may be available upon request

LOCATION:
- Serving clients in the local area
- Convenient, professional medical spa setting

documents.title: Frequently Asked Questions
documents.content:
Q: Is Brandi available right now?
A: Brandi is often with patients during the day. If she can't take your call, the AI assistant can help you schedule an appointment or answer common questions. Brandi will follow up personally as soon as she's available.

Q: Do I need a consultation first?
A: Aesthetic consultations are FREE and completely optional. For most treatments, we can discuss your goals during your first appointment. Brandi takes time with each client to ensure you're comfortable and informed.

Q: What makes Forever 22 different?
A: Brandi Sesock leads a small boutique team that delivers highly personalized care. You'll be seen by Brandi or Gale depending on the service and availability, and every visit is tailored to your goals.

Q: What is the Perfect Derma Peel?
A: The Perfect Derma Peel is a FAVORITE service and signature treatment at Forever 22! It's a medium depth chemical peel that addresses hyperpigmentation, large pores, fine lines, wrinkles, and acne scars. You'll peel for 3-4 days and have perfect skin in 7 days. It's ideal for any skin type and delivers dramatic results.

Q: Does Botox hurt?
A: Most clients describe minimal discomfort - like a small pinch. Brandi uses very fine needles and excellent technique. The treatment only takes 10-15 minutes.

Q: When will I see results?
A: Botox results appear in 3-5 days, with full results at 2 weeks. Fillers show immediate results, though final results appear after swelling subsides (2-7 days). The Perfect Derma Peel shows results in 7 days. Other treatments vary - Brandi will explain expected timelines.

Q: Will I look natural?
A: Absolutely! Brandi specializes in natural-looking enhancements. You'll look like yourself, just refreshed and rejuvenated. She takes a conservative approach and can always add more if needed.

Q: How many treatments will I need?
A: This varies by service. Botox lasts 3-4 months. Fillers last 6-18 months. Laser hair removal requires 6-8 sessions. Microneedling works best in a series of 3 treatments, 4 weeks apart. Skin treatments often work best in a series. Brandi will create a personalized plan for your goals.

Q: What is the best treatment for my concern?
A: Book a FREE aesthetic consultation! Brandi will assess your skin, discuss your goals, and recommend the best treatment plan. There's no obligation - just helpful, expert guidance.

Q: Do you offer weight loss programs?
A: Yes! We offer medically supervised weight loss programs with prescription injections. Brandi provides nutritional support and ongoing care throughout your journey. Book a consultation (in-person or virtual) to learn more and see if you're a candidate.

Q: What skincare products do you recommend?
A: Forever 22 offers SkinMedica, a pharmaceutical-grade skincare line with next-generation growth factors and peptides. These medical-grade products deliver results beyond over-the-counter options and help maintain your treatment results at home.
